text: Woodspring Suites in Davenport, Iowa WoodSpring Hotels is an American hotel chain founded in July 2015. As of June 30, 2020, it has 281 hotels with 33,797 rooms. The hotel chain was founded in 2003 by Jack DeBoer, and once operated as Value Place. In April 2015 the brand changed name to WoodSpring Hotels and began developing WoodSpring Suites and WoodSpring Suites Signature hotels exclusively. ==References== Category:Hotels established in 2003 Category:Hotel chains in the United States
title: WoodSpring Hotels
